definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: She rakes the ashes out of the stove in the evening every day.
sentences.chinese: 她每天晚上將爐渣從爐子裏耙出來。

sentences.english: Personally, I do not bake any PC in my kitchen oven.
sentences.chinese: 個人來說，我從來不會用我的廚房爐子來烘焙軟陶。

sentences.english: The oven is made of bricks and the meat is roasted over it. It is called BBQ in short.
sentences.chinese: 爐子是磚砌的，可在爐子上烤肉，簡稱BBQ。

sentences.english: The oven is made of bricks and the meat is roasted over it. It is called BBQ in short.
sentences.chinese: 爐子是磚砌的，可在爐子上烤肉，簡稱BBQ。

sentences.english: Cold is defensed by the stove.
Mrs. Simpson put her soup on the stove.
sentences.chinese: 辛普森太太將湯放到爐子上。

sentences.english: The boiling soup subsides when the pot is taken off the heat.
sentences.chinese: 把鍋從爐子上端開時，湯就不再沸騰了。

sentences.english: Turn off that pan you're smoking the place out!
sentences.chinese: 快把坐着鍋的爐子關上你把這兒弄得都是煙。

sentences.english: He threw the snakeskin into the fire and watched it burn.
sentences.chinese: 他把蛇皮扔進爐子裏，眼看着被火燒成了灰燼。

sentences.english: The chicken is wrapped in lotus leaves with flavours, then packed around with clay and baked.
sentences.chinese: 雞先被包在荷葉裏面，再包在泥土去爐子裏烤。

sentences.english: I have a cake in the oven.
You should be able to perform fast heat-switches from the bare simmer to the rolling boil on your burners.
sentences.chinese: 你的爐子應該能在小火慢燉和大火沸騰之間切換自如。

sentences.english: Oil-fired boilers and furnaces need a yearly cleaning and tuneup.
sentences.chinese: 燃油的鍋爐和爐子需要每年清洗和調整。

sentences.english: Take the saucepan off the stove.
A：Also, one of the burners on the stove doesn’t work.
sentences.chinese: 還有，爐子上有一個爐頭點不着火。

sentences.english: Water heated by the stove has overbrimmed the kettle.
sentences.chinese: 爐子上燒的水已溢出了水壺。

definition: see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
to light a fire for cooking
